1.「……ふふふ。やっぱり 来たわね。| 旅人のあなたなら 宿屋に立ち寄ると思って|: ...Hmm. I knew you'd come. I figured you'd|stop by the Inn, being a traveler and all, so|I've been keeping you here!

2.「あたしとの約束 覚えてるわよね？| 前に ホッツィ親方の家で話していた| あの: You remember our agreement, don't you? Tell me|more about that monster you were talking about|at Boss Hottsi's house before.<yesno><close>

3.「今の質問は 社交辞令みたいなものよ。| あたしの頼みに 断るという選択肢はない: The question was a social call. Refusing my|request is not an option. I wish you'd read my|mind.

5.「……なるほど。今 このアグラニは| その魂を吸い取る 魔獣ビュブロスとかいう|: I see. So now this Agrani is being hunted by a|soul-sucking Magical Beast Byblos or something|like that.

6.「そして その化け物を倒すために| あの賢者ブロッゲンが 立ち上がったと……。|: And to defeat that monster, that sage Broggen|rose up... hmmm... just as I thought.

7.「このチャンス 逃す手は ないわ！| ブロッゲンよりも先に あたしが| その魔獣: I can't let this chance pass me by! I'll|defeat that hexenbiest before Broggen does and|become the hero!

8.「<pc>と言ったかしら？| いい情報を 教えてくれて ありがとう。| お礼とい: Did I say <pc>? Thanks for the tip. I|don't know if I can ever thank you enough.

9.「あなたを あたしの下僕にしてあげるわ！| 光栄に 思いなさい！: I will make you my servant! You should be|honored!

11.「ムチェ！ ブチャ！| このドン亀！ なにチンタラやってんのよ！| 賢者ブロッゲ: Mutch! Butch! You turtle! What are you doing?|Did you find out where Sage Broggen went?

12.「ハア ハア……。はい……。| ブロッゲンは 北のモガリム街道を 北東に抜け|: Haa haa... yes... Broggen says he took the|Mogarim Highway north, then northeast into|Ezesol Canyon.

13.「ふうん。なるほど。| エゼソル峡谷の その場所をくまなく探せば| 魔獣ビュブロ: Hmmm. I see. So if we search all over that|place in Ezesol Canyon, we can find Magical|Beast Byblos.

14.「それじゃ 新米下僕の <pc>。| 賢者ブロッゲンの足取りを追って ヤツより先:
Well then, my new servant, . You|must follow the footsteps of the sage Broggen|and defeat the hexenbiest before he does. Of|
|course, you'll do it, right?

15.「いい返事ねっ！ その心構えがあれば| あたしの筆頭下僕になれる日も 近いわよ！: That's a great answer! If you're ready for it,|you'll soon be my first servant! So go ahead|and work hard!

16.「ムチェ！ ブチャ！| あたしたちも 出発するわよ！| さっさと 案内しなさい！: Mutch! Butch! We're leaving too! You'll show|us the way, quickly!

17.「ハア ハア……。| ったく 人使いが荒いぜ……。: Ha ha ha... can't stand it... they're so rough|on you...

18.「でもよ オレたち あの命令が| やみつきに なっちまったんだよな……。| 人生: But we got addicted to that order... you never|know what can happen in life.

19.「バカッ！ そんなこと バラすんじゃねえ！| 早く行こうぜ！ あの人を待たすと|: You idiot! Don't tell anyone about that! Let's|go, let's go, let's go! If we wait for him,|he'll slap us again!

20.「お前も モタモタすんなよ。| 新入りぃ！: Don't be too slow, you too. New guy!

21.「なによっ！ あなたは やる気なのに| 他のヤツの依頼が いっぱいで| あたしの: What? You're so motivated, but you can't take|my request because you're full of other|people's requests!

22.「人にモノを頼んでいいのは あたしだけよ！| たまった依頼を片付けて その辺りの:
I'm the only one who can ask people to do|things for me! You should finish your stack of|requests and make sure they know what they're|
|talking about!

23.「ふうん。あたしの頼みを 断るのね。| いつもなら 断るなんて選択肢は| 選ばせ: Hmm. You're turning down my request, aren't|you? Normally, I wouldn't give you the option|of refusing, but...

24.「あなたは 使えそうだから 慎重にいくわ。| あたしの下僕になることのメリットを:
You could be useful, so I'll be discreet.|You'll have to think long and hard about the|merits of being my servant before you come|
|back.

25.「……ふふふ。やっぱり 来たわね。| どう？ この間の件 考えなおしてくれた？: ...Hmm. I knew you'd come. How's it|going? Have you reconsidered the other day?

26.「アグラニを狙う 魔獣ビュブロス……。| そいつを 賢者ブロッゲンの足取りを追っ:
Magical Beast Byblos is after Agrani, and|we're going to follow Sage Broggen's footsteps|and defeat him before the bearded old man|
|does.

27.「これを果たせば あたしは英雄……。| あなたは その名誉ある下僕になれるってワ: If I do this, I will be a hero and you will be|my honored servant. Why would I turn down such|a great offer?

28.「先回りして来てるとは| あなた なかなか 使えるじゃない。: You're pretty handy, coming ahead of the|others.

30.「なによっ！ ブロッゲンのヒゲオヤジが| もう 魔獣と戦っちゃってるじゃない！: What? Broggen's bearded father is already|fighting a hexenbiest!

31.「ひとまず かくれて見てるわよ。| スキあらば 手柄を横取りしてやるわッ！: I'll hide and watch for now. I'll hide and|watch, and if I see a chance, I'll snatch the|credit!

32.「……魔獣ビュブロス！| 貴様の好きには させないのでアール！: Magical Beast Byblos! I won't let you do what|you want!

34.「なに あの杖…… 超使えるじゃない！| ただの クチうるさい杖じゃなかったの？: What's with the cane... it's so useful! I|thought you said it was just a cane with a|mouth.

37.「……ひとまず 終わりましたね。| ブロッゲンさま。: ...I think we're done for now. Mr. Broggen.

39.「ブラボー！ 賢者ブロッゲンのおじさま！| さすがね。ホレ直しちゃったわ。: Bravo! Uncle Sage Broggen! You're a real piece|of work, aren't you? I'm so in love with you.

40.「あっ！ あなたは ルナナ……！| いったい どこから わいてでたのさ！？: Ah! You are Lunana! Where in the world did you|come from?

41.「どうでもいいでしょ そんなこと。| それよりも どう？| この魔獣 あたしが: It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter. What do|you think? How about we pretend that I'm the|one who defeated this hexenbiest?

42.「どこを どうすれば| そんな考えになるでアールか！？| 今どきの若者は 恐ろし: How can you think like that?! The youth of|today are frightening!

43.「うっさい！ 棒ッ！| さっき ちょこっと見直したけど| やっぱり ただの クチ: Stick! Stick! I looked it over a little|earlier, but it's just a piece of stick with a|loud mouth!

44.「……ルナナよ。よく聞け。| 魔獣ビュブロスとの 戦いは| まだ 終わってはいな: ...Lunana. Listen carefully. The battle|against Magical Beast Byblos is not over|yet...

46.「あらら ブロッゲンさま 寝ちゃったね。| それじゃ ボクが 代わりに教えてあげ: Oh, Mr. Broggen, you fell asleep. Well then,|let me tell you something. I'll tell you how|that Hexenbiest and Mr. Broggen got together.

47.「今から数年前 ブロッゲンさまは| あのビュブロスの親…… レオン・ビュブロから: A few years ago now, Lady Broggen once|defended Agrani from the parent of|Byblos...Leon Byblo.

48.「レオン・ビュブロもまた 魂を吸い取る魔獣。| そんな恐ろしい魔物を ブロッゲン: Leon Byblo is also a soul-sucking hexabeast.|Broggen did everything in his power to defeat|this terrible monster, so let's go!

49.「でもね……。レオン・ビュブロは| 死に際に こう言ったんだ……。: But you know... on his deathbed, Leon Byblo|said...

50.「……我の魂を受け継いだ ３頭の子らが| 貴様たちに 復讐を果たすであろう……っ: Three of my children, who have inherited my|soul, will seek revenge against you.

51.「そして今 復讐に現れた 子供のうち| １頭を 倒したのでアール！| 残るビュブ: And now that I have defeated one of the|children who showed up for revenge! That|leaves two more Byblos to go!

52.「そんなワケで 残りの２頭も ボクらが| なんとかするから 余計なことしないでよ: That's why we'll take care of the other two,|so don't do anything unnecessary. See you|later.

53.「……ふふん。あたしって やっぱり| 幸運の星のもとに 生まれたのね。: I guess I was born under a lucky star after|all. I was born under a lucky star after all.

54.「まだ チャンスは ２回もあるってことよ！| なんとしてでも 残りの２頭を| ブ: That means we still have two more chances! I|will do everything in my power to beat the|other two before Broggen does!

56.「……ああ <pc>。| あなたは クビよ。| だって 依頼を こなせなかったん: ...Oh <pc>. You're fired. Because you|didn't do what we asked you to do.

57.「また 何か頼むかもしれないけど| 今回は 縁がなかったってことで。| それじゃ: I may ask for something else, but I'll just|say I had no luck this time. See you later.

58.「な…なあ 気にすんなよ。| あの人はさ 誰に対しても| ああいう人なんだ。: Hey, don't worry about it. He's like that to|everyone.

59.「お前は よくやったよ。| ホラ これ 今回の報酬だ。: You did good. Here. This is your reward.

60.「ムチェ！ 何してるの！？| 早く 行くわよ！: Mutch! What are you doing? Come on, let's go!

61.「それじゃな。| あの人のワガママに 付き合ってくれて| ありがとよっ！: See you later. Thanks for going along with her|selfishness!

62.「ハア… ハア……。| ルナナさ～ん ただいま 戻りやした……。: Haa... haa... Lunana~san, I'm back, I'm|back...

63.「で そこから 北に行くと すぐに| ふたつのつり橋に 挟まれた場所に出るんです:
And if you go north from there, you will soon|come to a place between two suspension|bridges, and he seems to be looking for|
|something there. He's looking for something|there.

64.「モガリム街道から 北東のエゼソル峡谷に入って| すぐ北の ふたつのつり橋に 挟:
If you look everywhere between the two|suspension bridges just north of the Mogarim|Highway and northeast into Ezesol Canyon, you|
|will find Byblos.
